name: James Ghillan
speciality: James is responsible for troubleshooting issues and fixing them aiming to maximum reliability and functionality. He is an excellent auto mechanic has good eye-hand coordination and manual dexterity.

name: Philip Karl
speciality: Karl is responsible for vehicle design, development, manufacture and testing.

name: Robert Pearl
speciality: Robert is inspecting the vehicle's mechanical components and its engine, diagnosing problems with vehicles and performing maintenance and repair work on cars, trucks and other vehicles.

name: Jessie Nelson
speciality: Jessie is inspecting vehicle engine and mechanical/electrical components to diagnose issues accurately. Also inspecting vehicle computer and electronic systems to repair, maintain and upgrade. Conducting routine maintenance work aiming to vehicle functionality and longevity.
